topics.body:
Saw some video bits of other M. There was an attack going on on another ship and Samus wanted to go over and help them.

It really WAS awkward to see her just stand there, and panic a bit later. I would have imagined she would just  go off and try any, screwing any orders.

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c5fa606368727fbfcd0000#post_54c5fa606368727fbfcd0000

Probably not. Samus doesn't really have that much of personality to work off, nor is there any real story to the series. It would likely just end up as generic action movie ala Resident Evil.

Ofcourse I could be wrong.
